overview: The only thing Abdul ever wanted was to write classical poetry. Instead he unknowingly ends up working for demons that commission him to write the most evil book of sorcery known to man:  the Necronomicon.  It’s an epic tale of evil vs. slightly less evil as an inter-dimensional battle rages between horrific monsters of the H.P. Lovecraft mythos. Earth is the battleground, and it’s up to one human to save the world; the very man that haphazardly awoke the monsters in the first place - Abdul Alhazred.
title: Fhtagn Rock Opera of Dooom
